transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Ji, Namaskar sir. 
Customer: Sir, Namaskar sir.
Executive: Ha, sir, Ankush Singh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se aapka account manager. 
Customer: Ha, ha, boliye sir, Namaste sir.
Executive: Ji, abhi jaise meri baat hui thi na sir video meeting ke dwara, maine aapko IndiaMART ki jo directory inquiry hai, lead manager, buyleads aur PNS number aur product ke bare mein maine bataya, uski ratings vagarah ke bare mein ki rating kis tarike se aapko karni hai aur regular follow karna hai customer ko. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Ji sir, ji sir, ji sir. 
Executive: Ha, to baki koi bhi concern issue hai to directly aap mujhe phone ya WhatsApp kar sakte ho, mai regular aapke touch me rahunga. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Yes sir, yes sir, yes sir, 100%. Thik hai? To abhi koi aur changes ki requirement to nahi hai sir catalog me services me vagarah me aur koi catalog concern issue?
Executive: Nahi, catalog me kuch nahi hai, catalog me char panch photo dalne ka baki hai. Wo ek update karne ka, baki sab thik hai, all okay hai.
Executive: Product to aap add kar loge apne according, jaise maine aapko bataya hai?
Customer: Ha, ha, mai bilkul kar lunga, beta kar lega wo to. 
Executive: Ha, koi dikkat nahi, baki koi bhi jankari leni ho to aap mujhe connect kar sakte hai, koi dikkat nahi hai. Aur mere paas ha, mere paas ye ticket aaya tha sir, mai ise apne end se close kar raha hu. Mere liye feedback aayega, thik hai, wo feedback aap jarur share kijiyega. Thik hai sir? Mai apne end se close kar raha hu. 
Customer: Yes sir, 100%, 100%, okay. 
Executive: Thank you sir, thank you for your valuable time. Have a nice day sir. 
Customer: Okay sir, thank you. Have a nice day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs to add photos to catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed customer can add photos.
- Executive is closing the ticket from his end.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, buyleads, feedback, pns number
